headline: KKR & Co. CFO Sees Better 2026 Deal Outlook, Says Diversified Earnings Aren’t Priced In
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) CFO Rob Lewin said the firm is entering 2026 with improving visibility into deal activity, stronger fundraising momentum, and a more diversified earnings base that he believes is not fully reflected in the company’s share price. Lewin made the comments during a UBS conf
